import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Product from '../components/Product'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import data from '../data'; import {useSelector} from 'react-redux'; export default function ProductScreen(props) { const productDetails= useSelector(state => state.productDetails); con if (!Product){ return
Produit Indisponible
} return

    {product.description}

  • Etat dans le stock :
